text: Ke kaloku abo baye bashiyeke ngemva bangama-Arabhu asentlango, baza kuthi kuwe: “Iimpahla zethu neentsapho zethu ziye zasibambezela, ngoko ke wena sicelele itarhu (kuAllâh).” Bona bathetha ngamalwimi abo okungekho zintliziyweni zabo. Yithi: “Ngubani ongathintela uAllâh xa Enokuthi Athande ukuba uhlelwe kokuluncedo? Nakanye, uAllâh Ukwazi konke enikwenzayo
